actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to amend paragraph 2 of Rule XXV and to make certain majority party committee appointments.

summary.text: Amends rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to increase the membership of the Committees on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry and on Governmental Affairs for the remainder of the 97th Congress. Assigns Senator Hatch of Utah to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry, and Senator Schmitt of New Mexico to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution to amend paragraph 2 of Rule XXV and to make certain majority party committee appointments.
